Python Indoor Propagation Simulator for Mobile Localization

PyLayers is an indoor mobile radio propagation simulator. The purpose is to help the design and the evaluation of localization and positioning algorithms in heterogeneous network and RTLS systems using Ultra Wide Band radio technology.

Module References

Acknowledgements

Main Features

  • Open Street Map format layout edition with JOSM
  • Standalone python modules for handling material,slab,antennas,channel,mobility,algorithms, ...
  • Handling of Impulse Radio Ultra Wideband Band (IR-UWB) waveforms
  • Compact UWB Antenna modeling using spherical harmonics representations
  • Fast indoor coverage using a Motley Keenan Multiwall Model
  • Incremental ray tracing tool based on layout graph extraction and evaluation of ray signatures
  • Agent mobility based on SimPy
  • Localization algorithms (geometric and algebraic)
  • (Ongoing) Human mobility input from motion capture files and from IMUSIM
  • (Ongoing) Output for event-driven simulator WSNET
  • Open source GPL license
